history.proof: intros. unfold msg_spec in *. unfold post_msg in *. simpl in *. unfold valid in *. simpl in *. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: apply msg_specE' with (to' := to') in H1.
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable tms.

In environment s : union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) from, from' : nat to : nid to', tg : nat cnt : seq nat tms : TaggedMessage H : UMC.defined s H0 : (from == from') = false H1 : msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) s Unable to unify "msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) s" with "msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) (s \\+ fresh s \\\\-> {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |})".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage))
from': Equality.sort nat_eqType
from: Equality.sort nat_eqType
to: nid
to': nat
tg: Equality.sort nat_eqType
cnt: Equality.sort (seq_eqType nat_eqType)
tms: TaggedMessage

Goal:
valid s -> (from == from') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |}).1

Premises:
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
nid = nat : Set
msg_spec = fun (from to : nid) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) : nid -> nid -> nat_eqType -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> soup -> Prop
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
mid = [ordType of nat] : ordType
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
seq_eqType = fun T : eqType => EqType (seq T) (seq_eqMixin T) : eqType -> eqType
msg_specE' : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from : nid) (to to' tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> (to == to') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1
msg_specE : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from to : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1
msg_spec_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (from to tg : nat) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (cnt' : seq nat) (i : mid), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt' |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_toE' : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from' : nat_eqType) (to' : nat), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> (from' == from) = false -> no_msg_from_to from to (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |}).1
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_toE : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (tms : TaggedMessage) (to' : nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> (to == to') = false -> no_msg_from_to from to (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1
msg_specE_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> (pt != from) || (to != to') -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_post : forall (from from' to : nid) (s : soup) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> from' != from -> no_msg_from from (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to; active := true |}).1
no_msg_from_consume : forall (from : nid) (from' to : nat) (s : union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from'; to := to; active := true |} -> valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> no_msg_from from (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_to_consume : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (i : mid), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
vrefl_rect : forall x : ?T, ?P x -> x = x where ?T : [s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) from : nat_eqType from' : nat_eqType to : nid to' : nat tg : nat_eqType cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType tms : TaggedMessage |- Type] ?P : [s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) from : nat_eqType from' : nat_eqType to : nid to' : nat tg : nat_eqType cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType tms : TaggedMessage |- pred ?T]
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
no_msg_to = fun (to : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
no_msg_from = fun (from : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (to : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
SubType : forall (sub_sort : Type) (val : sub_sort -> ?T) (Sub : forall x : ?T, ?P x -> sub_sort), (forall K : sub_sort -> Type, (forall (x : ?T) (Px : ?P x), K (Sub x Px)) -> forall u : sub_sort, K u) -> (forall (x : ?T) (Px : ?P x), val (Sub x Px) = x) -> subType ?P where ?T : [s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) from : nat_eqType from' : nat_eqType to : nid to' : nat tg : nat_eqType cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType tms : TaggedMessage |- Type] ?P : [s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage) from : nat_eqType from' : nat_eqType to : nid to' : nat tg : nat_eqType cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType tms : TaggedMessage |- pred ?T]
no_msg_from_imp : forall (from : nid) (to : nat) (d : soup), no_msg_from from d -> no_msg_from_to from to d
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
post_valid : forall s : soup, valid s -> forall m : msg TaggedMessage, valid (post_msg s m).1
PCM.sort = fun t : pcm => let (sort, _) := t in sort : pcm -> Type PCM.sort is a coercion
is_active = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
consume_msg = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => match find id s with | Some m => upd id (mark_msg m) s | None => s end : soup -> mid -> soup
is_consumed = fun (s : soup) (id : mid) => exists m : msg TaggedMessage, find id s = Some m /\ ~~ active m : soup -> mid -> Prop
mark_other : forall (m m' : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)), valid s' -> (m' == m) = false -> find m' (consume_msg s' m) = find m' s'
valid_mt_soup = (fun _evar_0_ : true => eq_ind_r [eta is_true] _evar_0_ (valid_unit (union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)))) is_true_true : valid (dsoup empty_dstatelet)
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
all = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix all (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => a x && all s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> bool Arguments all {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
post_fresh : forall (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage), (post_msg s m).2 \notin dom s
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Arguments last {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | _ :: s' => (size s').+1 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Arguments size {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
count = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix count (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | x :: s' => a x + count s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> nat Arguments count {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
Inductive reflect (P : Prop) : bool -> Set := ReflectT : P -> reflect P true | ReflectF : ~ P -> reflect P false Arguments Bool.reflect _%type_scope _%bool_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectT _%type_scope Arguments Bool.ReflectF _%type_scope
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
filter = fun (T : Type) (a : pred T) => fix filter (s : seq T) : seq T := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => if a x then x :: filter s' else filter s' end : forall T : Type, pred T -> seq T -> seq T Arguments filter {T}%type_scope _ _%seq_scope
consume_valid : forall (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (m : mid), valid s' -> valid (consume_msg s' m)
find_consume : forall (s' : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (id : mid) (m : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find id s' = Some m -> find id (consume_msg s' id) = Some (mark_msg m)
find_mark : forall (m : mid) (s' : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (msg0 : msg TaggedMessage), valid s' -> find m (consume_msg s' m) = Some msg0 -> exists msg' : msg TaggedMessage, find m s' = Some msg' /\ msg0 = mark_msg msg'

```intros. intros H1 H2 H3.
unfold msg_spec in *. unfold post_msg in *. simpl in *.
unfold valid in *. simpl in *.
intros. apply msg_specE' with (to' := to') in H1. apply H1.
exact H3. exact H2.
Qed.```

original: intros. intros H1 H2 H3. unfold msg_spec in *. unfold post_msg in *. simpl in *. unfold valid in *. simpl in *. intros. apply msg_specE' with (to' := to') in H1. apply H1. apply H3. apply H2.
